title: Can't go ranked and shop
body: Hello , I have tried your new customer ! it is great the graphics are just huge! but I can't  to get into the ranked or in the store . {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
It seems that only Normal queues are selectable from the Alpha Client.
Ranked, Co-op vs. AI, RGM, Custom, and Training modes are currently unavailable in this client. However, you can still switch back to the Legacy client to play these modes.
http://i.imgur.com/KSCefjA.png

{{champion:17}}
